text:
üëã Welcome
I‚Äôm a Bioinformatician and Data Analyst with experience in microbiome analysis, ecological modeling, and health data visualisation. I combine scripting in R and Bash with strong analytical workflows to generate reproducible insights from complex datasets.
üìç Based in Colombia ‚Äî seeking PhD opportunities and data-intensive collaborations.

Here


Geographic and geospatial analyses of COVID-19 in Colombia: Trends in case distribution, recovery, and mortality (2023‚Äì2024)
This project consists of an interactive dashboard that allows users to explore the evolution of cases, recoveries and deaths at geographical (departments and municipalities), demographic (age, sex and ethnic group) and clinical (patient status and type of infection) levels.
Objectives of the analysis:

Examine the dynamics of positive COVID-19 cases, recoveries, and deaths at the geographical, demographic, and clinical levels during the years 2023‚Äì2024
Calculate KPIs such as percentage of deaths, recoveries, and active cases

Dashboard:
